content.query:
-- Create an external table using create external table statement using Electric_Vehicle_Population_Data_1.csv

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ElectricVehicle_Ext_table (
    [VIN (1-10)] VARCHAR(100),
    County VARCHAR(100),
    City VARCHAR(100),
    State VARCHAR(50),
    [Postal Code] VARCHAR(20),
    [Model Year] INT,
    Make VARCHAR(100),
    Model VARCHAR(100),
    [Electric Vehicle Type] VARCHAR(100),
    [Clean Alternative Fuel Vehicle (CAFV) Eligibility] VARCHAR(100),
    [Electric Range] INT,
    [Base MSRP] INT,
    [Legislative District] VARCHAR(50),
    [DOL Vehicle ID] VARCHAR(100),
    [Vehicle Location] VARCHAR(200),
    [Electric Utility] VARCHAR(200),
    [2020 Census Tract] VARCHAR(100)
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/Electric_Vehicle_Population_Data_1.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = Raw_Ext_Source,
    FILE_FORMAT = CSV_Format
);

SELECT * FROM dbo.ElectricVehicle_Ext_table;


--12. Create an external table using create external table statement using covid_tracking.parquet file - CETAS

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE CovidTracking_Ext_table
WITH
(
    LOCATION = 'External_Tab/covid_tracking_ext/',
    DATA_SOURCE = Raw_Ext_Source,
    FILE_FORMAT = Parquet_Format
)
AS
SELECT * 
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK '/covid_tracking.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'Raw_Ext_Source',
    FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
) AS Data;

SELECT * FROM dbo.CovidTracking_Ext_table;
